Abilities can critically strike.

TFT_Consumable_MasterworkUpgrade.description: Use on a unit to open an armory containing Radiant versions of that unit's craftable completed items. Upgrade the item you choose to its Radiant equivalent, and unequip it.

TFT_Consumable_TrashToTreasure_Reforger.name: Reforger
TFT_Consumable_TrashToTreasure_Reforger.description:
Unequip all items and randomly transform them into new ones of a similar type and quality.
Trash to Treasure: Completed items transform into Artifacts and do not consume the Reforger

[Consumable - This item disappears when used.]

TFT11_Item_ThiefsGlovesSupport.name: Accomplice's Gloves
TFT11_Item_ThiefsGlovesSupport.description:
Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

TFT9_Consumable_GoldenItemRemover.name: Golden Item Remover
TFT9_Consumable_GoldenItemRemover.description: Use on a champion to unequip all items as many times as you want

TFT3_Item_BlademasterEmblem.name: Blademaster Emblem
TFT3_Item_BlademasterEmblem.description: The holder gains the Blademaster trait.

TFT3_Item_StarGuardianEmblem.name: Star Guardian Emblem
TFT3_Item_StarGuardianEmblem.description: The holder gains the Star Guardian trait.

TFT3_Item_InfiltratorEmblem.description: The holder gains the Infiltrator trait.

TFT3_Item_ProtectorEmblem.name: Protector Emblem
TFT3_Item_ProtectorEmblem.description: The holder gains the Protector trait.

TFT3_Item_DarkStarEmblem.name: Dark Star Emblem
TFT3_Item_DarkStarEmblem.description: The holder gains the Dark Star trait.

TFT3_Item_CelestialEmblem.name: Celestial Emblem
TFT3_Item_CelestialEmblem.description: The holder gains the Celestial trait.

TFT3_Item_RebelEmblem.name: Rebel Emblem
TFT3_Item_RebelEmblem.description: The holder gains the Rebel trait.

TFT3_Item_BattlecastEmblem.name: Battlecast Emblem
TFT3_Item_BattlecastEmblem.description: The holder gains the Battlecast trait.

TFT11_Storyweaver3_Support.name: Talisman of Aid
TFT11_Storyweaver3_Support.description: Kayle's damaging attacks and abilities 30% <TFTKeyword>Shred</TFTKeyword> and <TFTKeyword>Sunder</TFTKeyword> enemies hit for 3 seconds.

TFT11_Storyweaver7_AP.name: Tome of Power
TFT11_Storyweaver7_AP.description: Kayle deals 10% more damage. When she casts, she fires two waves.

TFT11_Storyweaver5_AS.name: Scroll of Haste
TFT11_Storyweaver5_AS.description: Attacks grant Kayle 5% stacking Attack Speed.

TFT11_Consumable_Ghostly_SacrificialPact.name: Blood Pact
TFT11_Consumable_Ghostly_SacrificialPact.description:
Reveal the Ghostly hex. At combat start Ghostly units mark the unit in the Ghostly hex, gaining health, AD, and AP based on that unit's stats.

When the marked unit dies, the bonus is reduced by 50%.

TFT11_Item_InkshadowOx.name: Tattoo of Vitality
TFT11_Item_InkshadowOx.description: Attacks heal the holder for 2% of their max Health and deal the same amount as bonus magic damage.

TFT11_Item_InkshadowSnake.name: Tattoo of Toxin
TFT11_Item_InkshadowSnake.description:
Damage applies a toxin that deals an additional 33% of that damage over 3 seconds and 33% Wounds the target.

Wound: Reduces healing received

TFT11_Item_InkshadowPig.name: Tattoo of Protection
TFT11_Item_InkshadowPig.description: Gain a 50% max Health Shield after casting the first time each combat. When it breaks, grant 50% of this shield amount to the two nearest allies.

TFT11_Item_InkshadowRat.name: Tattoo of Bombardment
TFT11_Item_InkshadowRat.description: Every third attack fires bolts at the two lowest percent health enemies which deal 65% Attack Damage as physical damage.

TFT11_Item_InkshadowHorse.name: Tattoo of Force
TFT11_Item_InkshadowHorse.description: Whenever the holder acquires a new target they run quickly to and briefly stun them, dealing 250 magic damage, and double the stats from this item for 4 seconds.

TFT11_Item_InkshadowTiger.name: Tattoo of Fury
TFT11_Item_InkshadowTiger.description: Deal 34% bonus damage to targets below half health. On takedown, gain 40% attack speed for 6 seconds.

TFT11_Item_AltruistEmblemItem.name: Altruist Emblem
TFT11_Item_AltruistEmblemItem.description:
The holder gains the Altruist trait.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]

TFT11_Storyweaver3_AS.name: Talisman of Speed
TFT11_Storyweaver3_AS.description: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row 15% Attack Speed at the start of combat.

TFT11_Storyweaver3_AP.name: Talisman of Might
TFT11_Storyweaver3_AP.description: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row 20 Ability Power at the start of combat.

TFT11_Storyweaver7_AS.name: Tome of Swiftness
TFT11_Storyweaver7_AS.description: Kayle deals 10% more damage. Her attacks now hit in a 1-hex radius around the target

TFT11_Storyweaver7_Support.name: Tome of Mending
TFT11_Storyweaver7_Support.description: Every 8 seconds, revive the strongest ally that hasn't been revived yet at 50% of their maximum Health.

TFT11_Storyweaver5_AP.name: Scroll of Force
TFT11_Storyweaver5_AP.description: Kayle's ability hits a wider area.

TFT_Assist_RuneOfAllegiance.name: Rune of Allegiance
TFT_Assist_RuneOfAllegiance.description:
Use on any champion to transfer them to your partner. Any items held will pop off.

Once used, this item regenerates in 7 rounds.

[Cannot be used in combat.]
[Consumable - this item disappears when used.]

TFT_Assist_LesserRuneOfAllegiance.name: Lesser Rune of Allegiance
TFT_Assist_LesserRuneOfAllegiance.description:
Place on a Tier 1, 2, or 3 champion to transfer them to your partner. Any items held will pop off.

Once used, this item regenerates in 5 rounds. At 4-1 it upgrades into a Rune of Allegiance.

[Cannot be used in combat.]
[CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used.]

TFT_Consumable_TrainingDummy.name: Target Dummy
TFT_Consumable_TrainingDummy.description:
Use on a champion to spawn a movable target dummy nearby.

[Cannot be used in combat.
Consumable - This item disappears when used.]
